sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_NM, C.EVAL_CAT_ID, C.EVAL_CAT_NM, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, A.GOV_METRIC_NM, A.MAIN_METRIC_YN, CASE WHEN A.MAIN_METRIC_YN != 'Y' THEN 'NNN'||A.GOV_METRIC_NM ELSE 'YYY'||A.GOV_METRIC_NM END AS SEL_GOV_METRIC_NM, A.WEIGHT, A.EVAL_METHOD_ID, F_CODE_NM('146',A.EVAL_METHOD_ID,A.YEAR) EVAL_METHOD_NM, A.DETAIL_EVAL_SUMMARY_COMMENT, D.SC_DEPT_NM, E.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, CASE WHEN A.MAIN_METRIC_YN = 'Y' THEN NVL(A.WEIGHT,0) ELSE 0 END MAIN_WEIGHT, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID ) GRP_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, A.SORT_ORDER, MAIN_METRIC_YN DESC) GRP_NUM, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, A.EVAL_CAT_ID) CAT_CNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, A.EVAL_CAT_ID ORDER BY C.SORT_ORDER, A.SORT_ORDER, MAIN_METRIC_YN DESC) CAT_NUM FROM (SELECT ROWNUM MET_ORDER, X.YEAR, X.GOV_METRIC_ID, X.UP_METRIC_ID, X.GOV_METRIC_NM, X.EVAL_CAT_ID, X.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, X.EVAL_METHOD_ID, X.DETAIL_EVAL_SUMMARY_COMMENT, X.MAIN_METRIC_YN, X.WEIGHT, X.SC_DEPT_ID, X.INSERT_USER_ID, X.SORT_ORDER FROM (SELECT YEAR, GOV_METRIC_ID, UP_METRIC_ID, GOV_METRIC_NM, EVAL_CAT_ID, EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, EVAL_METHOD_ID, DETAIL_EVAL_SUMMARY_COMMENT, MAIN_METRIC_YN, WEIGHT, SC_DEPT_ID, INSERT_USER_ID, SORT_ORDER FROM (SELECT * FROM GOV_METRIC WHERE DELETE_DT IS NULL) WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND GBN_ID = '02' START WITH MAIN_METRIC_YN = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR GOV_METRIC_ID = UP_METRIC_ID AND PRIOR YEAR = YEAR ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_ORDER ASC ) X ) A INNER JOIN GOV_EVAL_CAT_GRP B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID = B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID INNER JOIN GOV_EVAL_CAT C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.EVAL_CAT_ID = C.EVAL_CAT_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = D.SC_DEPT_ID AND D.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER E ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = E.USER_ID ORDER BY A.MET_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER

SELECT YEAR , GOV_METRIC_ID , EVAL_CAT_ID , EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID , GOV_METRIC_NM , CONTENT , GBN_ID , DIREC_ID , EVAL_METHOD_ID , UNIT , ACT_CAL_TYPE , DETAIL_EVAL_SUMMARY_COMMENT , SC_DEPT_ID , INSERT_USER_ID , BASE_VALUE , BEST_TARGET , LOWEST_TARGET , STAD_CONST , SORT_ORDER , WEIGHT , SIMULATION_YN , UNMEAS_BEST_TARGET , MAIN_METRIC_YN , UP_METRIC_ID FROM GOV_METRIC WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND GOV_METRIC_ID = #govMetricId#
